home.name: My name is Herman
home.description: Software engineer from Belarus with experience in full-stack development, specializing in backend. I develop scalable IT products, improving business processes and solving key problems.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My Introduction
about.description: I specialize in back-end development, with deep knowledge of programming languages and technologies. I have successfully delivered complex projects, providing precise and effective solutions for businesses. I quickly master new technologies, solve challenging problems, and contribute to the development of companies.

first_card.title: Development
first_card.desc: I design and develop IT products with high quality, effectively implementing modern technologies that not only improve business processes but also contribute to cost optimization, ensuring efficient use of the budget.
first_card.first: Design and implementation of cloud systems
first_card.fifth: Ensuring security and compliance with requirements

second_card.title: Business
second_card.desc: I thoroughly analyze and structure business processes, creating effective strategies that strengthen business relationships, enhance the company's competitiveness, and contribute to resource optimization.

third_card.title: Partnership
third_card.desc: I build international business relationships by developing strategies for collaboration with foreign partners, expanding the company's global opportunities, and contributing to its growth on the international stage.
third_card.fourth: Coordination of business contracts and agreements
